objects.text:
• Sleek aluminum and glass construction with premium build quality
• 3.5-inch Retina display with brilliant color reproduction
• Iconic design with flat edges and minimalist aesthetic

product_details.name: iPhone 4 - Classic Sophistication Meets Revolutionary Design
product_details.description:
• Sleek aluminum and glass construction with premium build quality
• 3.5-inch Retina display with brilliant color reproduction
• Iconic design with flat edges and minimalist aesthetic
• Front-facing camera for video calls and selfies
• Home button with intuitive navigation
• Volume controls and silent switch for easy access
• Compact form factor perfect for one-handed use
• Compatible with thousands of App Store applications
• Durable stainless steel frame for enhanced protection
• Available in classic black or white finishes
• 16GB/32GB storage options for all your needs
• iOS platform with smooth, responsive performance

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sleek, modern promotional design that centers around a featured smartphone model. The background uses a dark diagonal gradient with abstract wave shapes and a circular highlight for added visual depth. The text layers are well-spaced and provide a clear hierarchy: the "heading" introduces the product prominently, followed by a "subheading" adding a tagline that emphasizes luxury and innovation. A bold "tagline" section captures urgency for a limited-time offer. The "product_image" is centrally placed and slightly elevated for focus. Informational features are listed in the "description" with bullet points. The "price" stands out in bright color below, followed by a standout "cta_background" and "cta" inviting user action.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #1A2C38
- Deep Navy: #0F1A22
- Sky Blue: #3498db
- Royal Blue: #2980b9
- Bright Yellow: #FFC107
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: This product image features a sleek smartphone with a clean and modern design, ideal for high-tech advertisement themes. The prominent colors include Deep Black (#1C1C1C) used on the phone’s frame and screen border, giving it a premium and professional look. A gradient of Vivid Blue (#49B2F5) to Deep Blue (#0076D1) fills the screen, adding contrast and energy. Soft Silver Gray (#D1D1D1) on the phone’s sides complements the dark front, offering balance and subtle metallic appeal. These colors are used effectively to highlight different sections while blending smoothly to emphasize the phone’s contemporary style, making it visually appealing for promotional banners.
